page.title: 18A Day in the Life of....
page.content: I get up at 8:00 when my mum wakes me. I finish breakfast by 8:30 and brush my hair. I help pack my sandwiches for lunch. I leave for school at 9:00 and arrive a few minutes later. Some of us go inside to do jobs but the rest of us stay out in the playground until the bell goes. When it does we stand still and wait until our class is called in then we unstack our chairs and read until the register is taken then we go into assembly. After assembly we go back to class and get on with our target work. Target work consists of two pieces of language and two maths cards. At 10:30 we have play. In the summer we go on the field and we are allowed to play football and rounders. After play we carry on with our target work until lunch at 12:15. /cont page 19
